meanings.sent1: The luckless puppy couldn't find its way back home.
meanings.sent2: She felt luckless after losing her favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: The luckless squirrel kept dropping its acorns from the tree.
meanings.sent4: The luckless flower wilted despite the gardener's care.
meanings.sent5: The luckless student forgot their homework for the third time this week.

meanings.sent1: The luckless explorer faced one mishap after another on the journey.
meanings.sent2: He was always the luckless one in his group when it came to winning contests.
meanings.sent3: The luckless coin always ended up in the fountain instead of the piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: The luckless clock struck thirteen, signaling a day of chaos ahead.
meanings.sent5: The luckless cat crossed paths with a black crow, sealing its fate for the day.
